post.body: I'm picturing Darren McGavin.
funny you should mention this. I 1st heard it on the radio and my 1st thought was, "I better check Twitter."
Yes, I am and now I know why. Thanks for sharing.
at home??? This I gotta here.
you should be done when? say in a week? Good luck with that then :-)
Carl quote heard 2day becoming a millionaire "Be a billionaire and invest in movies". Wonder how son Bill felt? http://tinyurl.com/82zl4r
As a lifelong Twins fan, I do have a soft spot for Carl Pohlad. Without him, there would not have been two World Series victories.
Those local stories being 1) the death of Carl Pohlad http://tinyurl.com/7hnkve 2) Al Franken declared the victor http://tinyurl.com/9jy4wf
Is it a coincidence that on the day I considered dumping the Star Tribune for good, I learned of two significant local stories on Twitter.
From my 88 year old parents 2 the other side of my sandwhich, my 10 year olds BB practice. If only the latter's energy could be bottled.
Back from my parents. If I'm blessed w/ a long life, I hope it includes both physical and mental health.
Grocery shopping 4 my parents. Why was it so hard 2 find the chocolate syrup? In hindsight, right next to the ice cream seems too obvious.
reading a couple of "between the lines" e-mails. Guess it's time for that old fashion face to face.
The holiday rush appears to extend into January for the Post Office. Could that explain all the *very* loud foul language I heard in DTSTP?
Coffee/water update -- 2 cups of coffee, 2 24 oz. bottles of water. Can I keep up this pace?
Met with my VP. He was in a surprisingly good mood. Vacations truly the fountain of youth.
Attending a daily standup for one of our application teams and learning about CATS and DOGS.
The calendar from "The Office" was hung with care in the hopes that clarity on what's most important to do will soon be there.
Monday morning mantra -- more water less coffee, more water w less coffe, more water wa, less coff, more water wat less cof, more water wate
I was greeted this morning by my daughter's "It's too early." I couldn't agree more!
